core/amp/products/styles:
<style amp-custom>
  {{> core/amp/css/base
    header_background=header_background
    header_text=header_text
    body_background=body_background
    color_headings=color_headings
    color_text=color_text
    footer_background=footer_background
    footer_text=footer_text
    color_accent=color_accent
    color_borders=color_borders
  }}
  {{> core/amp/css/header
    header_background=header_background
    header_text=header_text
    body_background=body_background
    color_headings=color_headings
    color_text=color_text
    footer_background=footer_background
    footer_text=footer_text
    color_accent=color_accent
    color_borders=color_borders
  }}
  {{> core/amp/css/footer
    header_background=header_background
    header_text=header_text
    body_background=body_background
    color_headings=color_headings
    color_text=color_text
    footer_background=footer_background
    footer_text=footer_text
    color_accent=color_accent
    color_borders=color_borders
  }}
  {{> core/amp/css/product
    color_headings=color_headings
    color_text=color_text
    color_accent=color_accent
    color_borders=color_borders
  }}
</style>

svg/icon-cart-empty:
<svg width="18" height="18" viewBox="0 0 18 18" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" role="presentation" title="Cart">
  <path d="M1 17h16V5H1v12zM0 4h18v14H0V4zm5.126 0H5v1h8V4h-.126a4.002 4.002 0 0 0-7.748 0zM4 5a5 5 0 1 1 10 0H4z" fill="currentColor" />
</svg>
svg/icon-cart-full:
<svg  width="18" height="18" viewBox="0 0 18 18" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" role="presentation">
  <path d="M4.1 4a5.002 5.002 0 0 1 9.8 0H18v14H0V4h4.1zm8.839.163S12.57 1 9 1 5.098 4.163 5.098 4.163h7.84z" fill="currentColor" fill-rule="evenodd"/>
</svg>
core/amp/layout/amp:
<!doctype html>
<html amp class="no-js" lang="{{ locale_name }}">
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8">
    <script async src="https://cdn.ampproject.org/v0.js"></script>
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1, minimum-scale=1, maximum-scale=1">
    <style amp-boilerplate>body{-webkit-animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both;-moz-animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both;-ms-animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both;animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both}@-webkit-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@-moz-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@-ms-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@-o-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}</style><noscript><style amp-boilerplate>body{-webkit-animation:none;-moz-animation:none;-ms-animation:none;animation:none}</style></noscript>
    <title>{{ head.title }}</title>
    {{{ head.meta_tags }}}
    {{{ head.config }}}
    {{#block 'head'}} {{/block}}
    <link href="{{ head.favicon }}" rel="shortcut icon">
    <link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Karla:400|Roboto:400" rel="stylesheet">
    {{#block 'amp-style'}} {{/block}}
    {{{head.rsslinks}}}
    {{inject 'themeSettings' theme_settings}}
    {{inject 'genericError' (lang 'common.generic_error')}}
    {{inject 'maintenanceMode' settings.maintenance}}
    {{inject 'urls' urls}}
    {{{snippet 'htmlhead'}}}
    <script async custom-element="amp-form" src="https://cdn.ampproject.org/v0/amp-form-0.1.js"></script>
    <script async custom-element="amp-sidebar" src="https://cdn.ampproject.org/v0/amp-sidebar-0.1.js"></script>
    <script async custom-element="amp-accordion" src="https://cdn.ampproject.org/v0/amp-accordion-0.1.js"></script>
    {{#if settings.amp_analytics_id}}
      <script async custom-element="amp-analytics" src="https://cdn.ampproject.org/v0/amp-analytics-0.1.js"></script>
    {{/if}}
    {{#block 'amp-scripts'}}{{/block}}
    {{> core/structured-data/website}}
  </head>
  <body>
    {{#block 'page'}} {{/block}}
  </body>
</html>

core/amp/products/product-images:
<section
  class="
    amp-product-images
    {{#unless product.images}}
      amp-no-product-images
    {{/unless}}
  "
  data-image-gallery
>
  {{#if product.images}}
   {{#if product.images.length}}
     <amp-carousel
       width="250"
       height="250"
       layout="responsive"
       autoplay
       loop
       delay="5000"
       type="slides"
     >
       {{#each product.images}}
         <amp-img
           class="amp-product-image"
           src="{{getImage this 'amp-product-image'}}"
           layout="fill"
           alt="{{this.alt}}"
         >
         </amp-img>
       {{/each}}
     </amp-carousel>
    {{/if}}
  {{else}}
    <amp-img
      class="amp-product-image amp-no-image"
      src="{{cdn theme_settings.default_image}}"
      layout="fill"
      alt="{{lang 'common.no_image'}}"
    >
    </amp-img>
  {{/if}}
</section>
